item.source: Playing a graphics on a certain location

item.title: Playing a graphics on a certain location
item.dc:creator: @Dan0194 Dan0194
item.description:
@Dan0194 wrote:

[quote=“Pure_, post:7, topic:543877”][quote author=Dan0194 link=topic=662756.msg4429574#msg4429574 date=1402592637]

[quote author=Pure_ link=topic=662756.msg4429571#msg4429571 date=1402591740]

Create an invisible (perhaps null) NPC and play the emote on him, you’ll need to soften the exception handling to not make it crash the client OR add the function yourself.

Lol bro I was trying that at the beggining wasn’t working well.

Umm I completed all the data of the outgoing packet if anyone wants here

public ActionSender sendGroundGraphics(int id, int height, int offset, int delay, Location location) { player.write(new PacketBuilder(85, Type.FIXED).putByteC(location.getY() - (player.getLastKnownRegion().getRegionY()) * 8).putByteC(location.getX() - (player.getLastKnownRegion().getRegionX()) * 8).toPacket()); PacketBuilder builder = new PacketBuilder(4); // <------ ????????????????????? builder.put((byte)offset); builder.putShort(id); builder.put((byte)height); builder.putShort(delay); player.write(builder.toPacket()); return this; }
[/quote]Does this even work? You’re giving the packet builder a buffer of 4 bytes then trying to insert 6?

Where am I doing that?
[/quote][/quote]

That’s the outgoing packet id

Read full topic

public ActionSender sendGroundGraphics(int id, int height, int offset, int delay, Location location) { player.write(new PacketBuilder(85, Type.FIXED).putByteC(location.getY() - (player.getLastKnownRegion().getRegionY()) * 8).putByteC(location.getX() - (player.getLastKnownRegion().getRegionX()) * 8).toPacket()); PacketBuilder builder = new PacketBuilder(4); // <------ ????????????????????? builder.put((byte)offset); builder.putShort(id); builder.put((byte)height); builder.putShort(delay); player.write(builder.toPacket()); return this; }

item.title: Playing a graphics on a certain location
item.dc:creator: @Dan0194 Dan0194
item.description:
@Dan0194 wrote:

[quote=“Pure_, post:5, topic:543877”][quote author=Dan0194 link=topic=662756.msg4429447#msg4429447 date=1402520270]

Create an invisible (perhaps null) NPC and play the emote on him, you’ll need to soften the exception handling to not make it crash the client OR add the function yourself.

Lol bro I was trying that at the beggining wasn’t working well.

Umm I completed all the data of the outgoing packet if anyone wants here

public ActionSender sendGroundGraphics(int id, int height, int offset, int delay, Location location) { player.write(new PacketBuilder(85, Type.FIXED).putByteC(location.getY() - (player.getLastKnownRegion().getRegionY()) * 8).putByteC(location.getX() - (player.getLastKnownRegion().getRegionX()) * 8).toPacket()); PacketBuilder builder = new PacketBuilder(4); builder.put((byte)offset); builder.putShort(id); builder.put((byte)height); builder.putShort(delay); player.write(builder.toPacket()); return this; }
[/quote]Does this even work? You’re giving the packet builder a buffer of 4 bytes then trying to insert 6?[/quote]

Where am I doing that?

item.title: Playing a graphics on a certain location
item.dc:creator: @pure2ownage Pure_
item.description:
@pure2ownage wrote:

[quote=“Dan0194, post:4, topic:543877”][quote author=Pure_ link=topic=662756.msg4429444#msg4429444 date=1402519508]
Create an invisible (perhaps null) NPC and play the emote on him, you’ll need to soften the exception handling to not make it crash the client OR add the function yourself.
[/quote]
Lol bro I was trying that at the beggining wasn’t working well.

Umm I completed all the data of the outgoing packet if anyone wants here

public ActionSender sendGroundGraphics(int id, int height, int offset, int delay, Location location) { player.write(new PacketBuilder(85, Type.FIXED).putByteC(location.getY() - (player.getLastKnownRegion().getRegionY()) * 8).putByteC(location.getX() - (player.getLastKnownRegion().getRegionX()) * 8).toPacket()); PacketBuilder builder = new PacketBuilder(4); builder.put((byte)offset); builder.putShort(id); builder.put((byte)height); builder.putShort(delay); player.write(builder.toPacket()); return this; }[/quote]Does this even work? You’re giving the packet builder a buffer of 4 bytes then trying to insert 6?

Read full topic
item.source: Playing a graphics on a certain location

item.title: Playing a graphics on a certain location
item.dc:creator: @Dan0194 Dan0194
item.description:
@Dan0194 wrote:

Pure_:

Create an invisible (perhaps null) NPC and play the emote on him, you’ll need to soften the exception handling to not make it crash the client OR add the function yourself.

Lol bro I was trying that at the beggining wasn’t working well.

Umm I completed all the data of the outgoing packet if anyone wants here

public ActionSender sendGroundGraphics(int id, int height, int offset, int delay, Location location) { player.write(new PacketBuilder(85, Type.FIXED).putByteC(location.getY() - (player.getLastKnownRegion().getRegionY()) * 8).putByteC(location.getX() - (player.getLastKnownRegion().getRegionX()) * 8).toPacket()); PacketBuilder builder = new PacketBuilder(4); builder.put((byte)offset); builder.putShort(id); builder.put((byte)height); builder.putShort(delay); player.write(builder.toPacket()); return this; }

Read full topic
